title: Playing lol on a console
body: for a while now i wondered if it were possible to just download LOL on a console (PS4) plug in a keyboard and mouse and just play LOl while probably streaming any thoughts on this or explanation as to if someone has done this before{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
If Ross can play League with bananas
then anything is possible

I dunno about playing ON a console, but you can play on a PS4 controller on computer. Thing is you won't be near as successful as you would with a mouse and keyboard. I've done it, but it is kinda awkward to use the joystick as your mouse cursor while having another button for right click. An interesting change of pace but don't expect to be as good as you could ever be on a mouse and keyboard.

It would work if you could mess with it enough to get it running, but a lot of features would not work, there would likely be bugs or input lag, and more importantly, _why_? Even an extremely cheap pc can run league as well as a console.

Boxbox played a few games with a PS4 controller.
Highly unrecommended.

When I didn't have a working mouse I played with a ps3 controller, I tried a few different character set ups and controller set ups.

In the end I could only play karthus some what easily due to his q spam.
